html:
Skip to main content

We understand that circumstances can change, and you may need to adjust or cancel your subscription. At Voy, we've made this process as straightforward as possible. Here's how you can manage your subscription

  1. Log into Your Account

    • Visit www.joinvoy.com/login
    • Enter your login credentials

  2. Navigate to Manage Plans

    • Once logged in, click on "Accounts" in the left-hand menu
    • Select "Manage Plans"

  3. View Your Subscriptions

    • Here you'll see a list of all your existing subscriptions

  4. Cancel Your Subscription

    • Select the subscription you wish to cancel
    • Follow the prompts to complete the cancellation process
    • Once you've completed the cancellation flow you'll receive an email to confirm your subscription has been cancelled.

To avoid unwanted charges or deliveries, remember to cancel your subscription before your next order is processed. 

Cancelling a Pending Subscription

If you want to cancel your first order before it's approved:

  1. Go to Account and then 'Manage Plans'
  2. Click on the medication you've ordered
  3. Look for the cancellation option at the bottom of the page
  4. Follow the cancellation steps

 If you cancel before approval, the pending payment reserved for your treatment will revert to your account and you'll no longer be able to see this payment in your bank statement. 

 

We value your journey with Voy and are here to support you, whether you're continuing with us or need to pause your treatment. Your health and satisfaction are our top priorities. Our team is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns about cancelling your subscription.

Related to

  • Subscription
  • Cancellation

Related articles

  • How does my subscription work?
  • How do I update my account or subscription?
  • How does the approval process work?
  • How does refer-a-friend work?
  • How do I contact Voy?
markdown:
[Skip to main content](https://joinvoy.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/20168823234452-How-do-I-cancel-my-subscription#main-content)

We understand that circumstances can change, and you may need to adjust or cancel your subscription. At Voy, we've made this process as straightforward as possible. Here's how you can manage your subscription

1. **Log into Your Account**
   - Visit [www.joinvoy.com/login](http://www.joinvoy.com/login "http://www.joinvoy.com/login")
   - Enter your login credentials
2. **Navigate to Manage Plans**
   - Once logged in, click on "Accounts" in the left-hand menu
   - Select ["Manage Plans"](https://www.joinvoy.com/account/myplans "https://www.joinvoy.com/account/myplans")
3. **View Your Subscriptions**
   - Here you'll see a list of all your existing subscriptions
4. **Cancel Your Subscription**
   - Select the subscription you wish to cancel
   - Follow the prompts to complete the cancellation process
   - Once you've completed the cancellation flow you'll receive an email to confirm your subscription has been cancelled.

To avoid unwanted charges or deliveries, remember to cancel your subscription before your next order is processed.

## Cancelling a Pending Subscription

If you want to cancel your first order before it's approved:

1. Go to [Account](https://www.joinvoy.com/account "https://www.joinvoy.com/account") and then ['Manage Plans'](https://www.joinvoy.com/account/myplans "https://www.joinvoy.com/account/myplans")
2. Click on the medication you've ordered
3. Look for the cancellation option at the bottom of the page
4. Follow the cancellation steps

If you cancel before approval, the pending payment reserved for your treatment will revert to your account and you'll no longer be able to see this payment in your bank statement.

We value your journey with Voy and are here to support you, whether you're continuing with us or need to pause your treatment. Your health and satisfaction are our top priorities. Our team is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns about cancelling your subscription.

Related to

- [Subscription](https://joinvoy.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/search?content_tags=01GVFX2B4X32J69W7K9KP7SWK4&utf8=%E2%9C%93 "Search results")
- [Cancellation](https://joinvoy.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/search?content_tags=01GVFX2YHA6FYNNVXA65MNTY34&utf8=%E2%9C%93 "Search results")

## Related articles
